scripts.madge:check-build: madge --circular --extensions ts cmd/ && madge --circular --extensions ts internal/
scripts.build: pnpm run format && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run madge:check-build && tsc -b
scripts.dev:prod: pnpm run build && NODE_ENV=production cross-env DEBUG=liquidns* node -r dotenv/config build/app.js
scripts.dev: pnpm run format && pnpm run build && NODE_ENV=development cross-env DEBUG=liquidns* nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' cmd/agentspace/main.ts
